courses_list.course_description:
* Provides an introduction to block-based programming using Code.org, an easy-to-use educational platform.
* No experience necessary.

* Introduces younger students to block-based programming using the Scratch platform. 
* Two 8-week courses; students should take Part 1 then part 2.
* No experience necessary for Part 1.

* Introduces students to the basics of block-based programming through creating games in Scratch. 
* Serves as a bridge to learning about text-based programming languages such as Python.

* Introduces students to the basics of Python, a text-based programming language that is widely used. 
* No experience needed.

* Introduces students to the use of HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) and CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) to design websites.
* No experience needed.

* Introduces students to the basics of Java, a popular programming language. 
* No experience needed.

* Introduces students to the basics of computer-aided design (the use of software to help with designing objects) using Tinkercad, an easy-to-use online platform. 
* No experience needed.
